name: blue-flute
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures sleep.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A flute made from blue glass that awakens sleeping Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A flute made from blue glass that awakens sleeping Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A flute made from blue glass. It awakens sleeping Pokémon.
